body.p:
Carson City, Nevada Terry
25th July 1861.
Sir:

My professional experience in this Territory having shown me the inconvenience to which persons are subjected by there being no one here authorized to take the acknowledgment of Deeds and other instruments of writing to be used in your State, I respectfully solicit the appointment from you of Commissioner of Deeds.
I would state that I have been a resident of this City for the last seventeen months, and am a member of the Bar.
Should I receive the Office I trust that the duties will be performed in such manner as not to discredit appointing power.

With very great respect
Sir
Your Obet ssvt
Samuel D. King
Recorder of Carson County
The Governor of the State of Kentucky.
